name: Enumeration Items naming convention - case and character set control
description: Names of Enumerations Items should start with an uppercase character and should not include any underscore
output:
This report lists all Enumerations Items with first letter not in uppercase or having an underscore.
It provides the following information:
  Enumeration Item full name
rationale: For readability aspects, naming conventions must be respected
remediation: Change name according to the naming convention
